A4.text: Portal of the U.S. Federal government of the United States

A5.text: the U.S. Constitution was written as a replacement for the Articles of Confederation, under which the United States was a loose confederation with a weak central government

A6.text: the Tenth Amendment to the United States Constitution, which reserves all powers and rights that are not delegated to the Federal Government as left to the States and to the people
